Row.Text: [COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]1 Free Technology. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Writing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a University in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.
